ValidationRule.description: Only Enterprise Onboarding team can change the Stage field to Close.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF($Profile.Name = "Enterprise Onboarding" || $Profile.Name = "System Administrator", FALSE, AND( $RecordType.Name = "Customer Onboarding", ISCHANGED(Stage__c), ISPICKVAL((Stage__c),"Closed")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Stage of the DSR to close.
